_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Bot Whatsapp & Bot Telegram
author: ibradecode@gmail.com
description: Egg untuk bot WhatsApp dengan dukungan Node.js 15-23. Disusun oleh Ibra.
startup: if [[ -d .git ]] && [[ {{AUTO_UPDATE}} == "1" ]]; then git pull; fi; if [[ ! -z ${NODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then /usr/local/bin/npm install ${NODE_PACKAGES}; fi; if [[ ! -z ${UNNODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then /usr/local/bin/npm uninstall ${UNNODE_PACKAGES}; fi; if [ -f /home/container/package.json ]; then /usr/local/bin/npm install; fi; if [[ ! -z ${CUSTOM_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLES} ]]; then vars=$(echo ${CUSTOM_ENVIRONMENT_VARIABLES} | tr ";" "\n"); for line in $vars; do export $line; done fi; /usr/local/bin/${CMD_RUN};

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update
apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python python-dev libtool
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

if [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "true" ] || [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" == "1" ]; then
    echo -e "assuming user knows what they are doing."
    exit 0
fi

if [[ ${GIT_ADDRESS} != *.git ]]; then
    GIT_ADDRESS=${GIT_ADDRESS}.git
fi

if [ -z "${USERNAME}" ] && [ -z "${ACCESS_TOKEN}" ]; then
    echo -e "using anon api call"
else
    GIT_ADDRESS="https://${USERNAME}:${ACCESS_TOKEN}@$(echo -e ${GIT_ADDRESS} | cut -d/ -f3-)"
fi

if [ "$(ls -A /mnt/server)" ]; then
    echo -e "/mnt/server is not empty."
    if [ -d .git ]; then
        echo -e ".git directory exists"
        if [ -f .git/config ]; then
            ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url)
        else
            exit 10
        fi
    fi
    if [ "${ORIGIN}" == "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]; then
        git pull
    fi
else
    if [ -z ${BRANCH} ]; then
        git clone ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    else
        git clone --single-branch --branch ${BRANCH} ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    fi
fi

if [[ ! -z ${NODE_PACKAGES} ]]; then
    /usr/local/bin/npm install ${NODE_PACKAGES}
fi

if [ -f /mnt/server/package.json ]; then
    /usr/local/bin/npm install --production
fi

echo -e "install complete"
exit 0

variables.name: Git Access Token
variables.description: Gunakan Personal Access Token dari GitHub atau GitLab.

variables.name: Command Run
variables.description: Perintah untuk menjalankan bot (default: npm start).
